an10.148:0.3: 148. The Teaching of the Good Persons
an10.148:1.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you the teaching of the good persons and the teaching of the bad persons. …
an10.148:1.3: And what is the teaching of the bad persons?
an10.148:1.4: Wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, wrong immersion, wrong knowledge, and wrong freedom.
an10.148:1.5: This is the teaching of the bad persons.
an10.148:1.6: And what is the teaching of the good persons?
an10.148:1.7: Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
an10.148:1.8: This is the teaching of the good persons.”
